trans-unit.source: Represents the `<CipherData>` element in XML encryption.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> class represents the `<CipherData>` element in XML encryption.
It is a required element that provides the encrypted data.

It must either contain the encrypted data as base64-encoded text of the `<CipherValue>` element, or provide a reference to an external location containing the encrypted data using the `<CipherReference>` element.
In many cases, you do not need to directly create a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> class.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.EncryptedXml%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> classes create instances for you.

A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object can have either a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> property or a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A> property, but not both.
A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> is thrown if both are assigned to a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"></xref> class.
This constructor creates a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object that represents the `<CipherData>` element in XML encryption.
The `<CipherData>` element is a required element in XML encryption.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"></xref> class using a byte array as the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue"></xref> value.
This constructor creates a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object that represents the `<CipherData>` element in XML encryption.
The constructor assigns the `cipherValue` value to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A> property as the actual encrypted data.

The `<CipherData>` element can have either a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> or a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A> child element, but not both.
A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> is thrown if both are assigned to a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object.
The encrypted data to use for the `<CipherValue>` element.
The cipherValue parameter is `null`.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue"></xref> property has already been set.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"></xref> class using a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference"></xref> object.

This constructor creates a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object that represents the `<CipherData>` element in XML encryption and assigns the `cipherReference` value to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> property.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> object represents the `<CipherReference>` element, which provides the location of the encrypted data.

A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object can have either a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> property or a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A> property, but not both.
A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> is thrown if both are assigned to a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference"></xref> object to use.
The cipherValue parameter is `null`.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue"></xref> property has already been set.
Gets or sets the `<CipherReference>` element.
The `<CipherReference>` element identifies a source which, when processed, yields the encrypted data.
For more information about this element, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>.

A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object can have either a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> property or a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A> property, but not both.
A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> is thrown if both are assigned to a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object.
A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherReference"></xref> property was set to `null`.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherReference"></xref> property was set more than once.
Gets or sets the `<CipherValue>` element.
The value is encrypted data.

The `<CipherData>` element can have either a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> or a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A> child element, but not both.
A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> is thrown if both are assigned to a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object.
A byte array that represents the `<CipherValue>` element.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue"></xref> property was set to `null`.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue"></xref> property was set more than once.
Gets the XML values for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"></xref> object.
Use this method to output XML for a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object.
A <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that represents the XML information for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue"></xref> property and the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherReference"></xref> property are `null`.
Loads XML data from an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> into a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"></xref> object.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.LoadXml%2A> method overwrites existing XML elements with the `value` parameter.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that represents the XML data to load.
The value parameter is `null`.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue"></xref> property and the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherReference"></xref> property are `null`.
